title: UPS whiteboard ads
content:
Please help me identify both fonts used in the UPS “whiteboard” ads. It’s not their usual FF Dax ripoff font. Thanks so much in advance!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Picture 1.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20090924020601/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%201_292.png) | 17.69 KB |
| [Picture 2.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20090924020601/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%202_165.png) | 20.94 KB |
author: DCamp2884

comments.content: The handwriting appears to be handwritten. All the ’t’s are unique. [Sansarah](http://web.archive.org/web/20090924020601/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/typetrust/sansarah_regular_ot/) will get you a similar look, and it has three options for every character.
